Music & Event Complexes

Live music venues and event complexes are the ideal environment to reach customers. They attract a wide demographic of people who are in a positive mind-set and are likely to be in a highly receptive frame of mind ‐ This is why our customers tell us their response rates are so high!


The Benefits of Digital Patient Information Screens for your Music Venue:

  • Gauranteed revenue payment
  • No Financial cost to you
  • Free installation and maintenance
  • Free venue information updates
  • Free in-house graphics service
  • Helping your local community
  • A tried and tested system
  • Only branded equipment used
  • Risk Free
